snippet: Sean Monahan scored his second goal of the game 1 minute 40 seconds into overtime to give the Calgary Flames a 3-2 win over the Capitals in Washington.
abstract: Calgary Flames beat Washington Capitals in overtime, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Sean Monahan scored his second goal of the game 1 minute 40 seconds into overtime to give the Calgary Flames a 3-2 win over the Capitals in Washington.
